HideyoshiNakazone/jambo

Converts JSON Schema definitions into Pydantic models

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Prisma generator that converts schema.prisma to JSON Schema format
  • Open-source JSON editor, visualizes JSON as interactive graphs, converts formats, validates, generates schema, executes queries
  • CLI for database schemas and migrations
  • Diff and patch tool for JSON and YAML
  • Generates OpenAPI schemas using Pydantic and Python frameworks
  • fixes broken JSON from LLMs in Python
  • OpenAPI schema generation for Django REST framework
  • Visualizes and processes JSON with jq support
  • convert command-line tool output to JSON or YAML for scripts
  • API client for macOS, Linux, and Windows
